message.content: {"given_definition_quality":40,"better_definition":"under; below","sentence":"水在桌子下。","image_prompt":"A simple, soft apocalypse animation style scene of a wooden table with a clear glass of water placed underneath it, set in a minimally furnished room with soft, surreal lighting and distant cloudy, dreamy apocalypse hints visible through a window.
